io.micronaut.http.ssl

Class ClientSslConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.ssl.SslConfiguration
      • io.micronaut.http.ssl.ClientSslConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Toggleable

    @ConfigurationProperties(value="micronaut.http.client.ssl")
public class ClientSslConfiguration
extends SslConfiguration
    The default SslConfiguration used for HTTP clients.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
